Detailed Description

The AtlItemGridWindow is the base class for AtlItemMenuWindow and AtlItemListWindow and contains the handling of featureitems and contexts. Each FeatureItem can have a specified context id, which overwrites the context of the window. Sub-ItemContainers are not handled.

Constructor

Member Function Documentation

void AtlItemGridWindow::ApplyContext (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Apply correct context: if item is a feature_item which has a context, this context is used, if the item_container is a FeatureItemContainer which has a context, this context is used, otherwise context of window is used.

Reimplemented in AtlItemMenuWindow.

void AtlItemGridWindow::OnGetFocus (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

When getting the focus, the correct context id has to be set. This can be the context of the selected FeatureItem, the context of the current FeatureItemContainer or the context of the window.

Reimplemented from AtlWindow.

Reimplemented in BtAvrcpControllerDeviceListWindow, BtAvrcpDeviceListWin, and UibFolderWin.
